detail_desc: Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shorts in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Joggers in washed stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets, tapered legs with elastication and gathers in the side seams and zips at the hems.

Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Zip at the back, dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a viscose weave with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets, a low crotch and straight legs.
Microfibre dress with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist, hips, back and bum. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps.

Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.
3/4-length trousers in a viscose weave with a high waist with pleats and a concealed zip in one side. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.

prod_name: PELLE Basic S/S jersey polo SB
detail_desc: Polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.

Jacket in felted fabric containing some wool with a small stand-up collar and diagonal zip down the front. Side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.

Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves, decorative metal buttons on the shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and pair of dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Dungarees with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable fasteners at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.

Spacious handbag in sturdy imitation leather with two handles, and a magnetic fastener at the top and a decorative strap with a covered metal fastener at the front. Two inner compartments, one with a zip, and studs on the bottom. Unlined. Size 15.5x32x36.5 cm.
High-waisted leggings in soft, patterned cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Hairband in woven fabric with a decorative knot at the front and covered elastic at the back.

Three-piece set in soft cotton. Long-sleeved shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded hem. Pre-tied bow tie with an elastic strap and fastener at the back. Fine-knit cardigan with a small V-neck and buttons down the front.

Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Joggers in soft organic cotton jersey with a frill-trimmed, elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend in various colours and designs.

Short-sleeved romper suit in soft organic cotton slub jersey. Yoke in woven fabric with broderie anglaise, a press-stud on the shoulders and narrow elastication at the hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 35x170 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
